actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill entitled the "Educational Exchanges Enhancement Act of 1991".

summary.text: Educational Exchanges Enhancement Act of 1991 - Provides for an increase in the number of U.S. Information Agency scholarships for foreign and U.S. students and scholars. Makes such scholarships available only to: (1) foreign students and scholars from Eastern European democracies, the Soviet Union, and countries with fewer than 1,000 citizens studying in the United States; (2) students from economic, social, or ethnic backgrounds not represented in the U.S. foreign student population; and (3) U.S. students and scholars for study, research, and teaching in Eastern European democracies, the Soviet Union, and non-European countries.

titles.title: A bill entitled the "Educational Exchanges Enhancement Act of 1991".
